text.div:
Concept Map - Care Connect Administrative Gender (https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/ConceptMap/CareConnect-AdministrativeGender-1)

Mapping from https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/ValueSet/CareConnect-AdministrativeGender-1 to https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/ValueSet/CareConnect-NHSDataDictionary-PersonStatedGender-1

ACTIVE. Published on 01-Aug-2017 01:00:00 by HL7 UK. Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

A Concept Map from ValueSet Administrative Gender to NHS Data Dictionary Person Stated Gender to aid interpretation.


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
maleequivalent1 (Male)
femaleequivalent2 (Female)
otherequivalent9 (Indeterminate (unable to be classified as either male or female))
unknownequivalentX (Not Known (not recorded))

name: Concept Map - Care Connect Administrative Gender
description: A Concept Map from ValueSet Administrative Gender to NHS Data Dictionary Person Stated Gender to aid interpretation.

target.display: Indeterminate (unable to be classified as either male or female)
